Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Blaze 5 Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
1 Magma Armor 3 The Pokémon is covered with hot magma, which prevents it from becoming frostbitten.
10 Guts 6 It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.
25 Flame Body 4 Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
40 Dry Skin 6 Rain and Water-type moves restore HP. Sunlight and Fire-type damage hurt more.
55 Humidity Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a heat wave.
70 Strong Jaw 7 The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.
85 Calderize 8 Normal-type moves become Fire-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
100 Convection 8 The Pokémon summons a thunderstorm upon entering battle.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 07 Illuminate 5 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
Disc 11 Ball Fetch 1 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
Disc 14 Flash Fire 5 Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
Disc 17 Mimicry 3 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Disc 33 Strong Jaw 7 The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.
Disc 42 Magma Armor 3 The Pokémon is covered with hot magma, which prevents it from becoming frostbitten.
Disc 48 Oblivious 3 The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or taunted.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Anger Point 7 The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.
Anticipation 3 The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.
Blaze 5 Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Calderize 8 Normal-type moves become Fire-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Cold-Blooded 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Competitive 7 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.
Convection 8 The Pokémon summons a thunderstorm upon entering battle.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Drought 9 Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Dry Skin 6 Rain and Water-type moves restore HP. Sunlight and Fire-type damage hurt more.
Flame Body 4 Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
Guts 6 It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.
Heatproof 6 The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
Humidity Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a heat wave.
Immunity 4 The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.
Inner Focus 3 The Pokémon's intensely focused, and that protects the Pokémon from flinching.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Magma Surge 9 Turns the ground into Magma Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Marvel Scale 5 The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.
Multiscale 8 Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
Pickup 2 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
Reckless 7 Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
Rough Skin 6 This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Stalwart 2 Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.
Stamina 7 Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
Stench 3 By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
Super Luck 5 The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unaware 7 When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target Pokémon's stat changes.
Beast Boost 7 The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.
Moxie 7 The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
Tough Claws 7 Powers up moves that make direct contact.
Unnerve 4 Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
